az: what of a love unspoken is it weaker without a name does this love deserve 2 exist without a title because i dare not share its name does that make me cruel and cold 2 deny the world of my salvation because i chose 2 let it grow people tend 2 choke that which they do not understand why shouldnt i be weary and withhold this love from man what of a love unspoken no one ever knows but this is a love that lasts and in secrecy it grows
